name: IOUserNetworkPacketQueue
desc: The base class for the queues that manage the packets moving to and from your device.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the queue.

items.name: - EnqueuePacket
items.desc: Adds a single network packet to the queue for processing.

items.name: - EnqueuePackets
items.desc: Adds multiple network packets to the queue for processing.

items.name: - DequeuePacket
items.desc: Retrieves a single network packet from the queue.

items.name: - DequeuePackets
items.desc: Retrieves multiple network packets from the queue.

items.name: - SetPacketBufferPool
items.desc: Assigns the specified buffer pool with this queue.

items.name: - SetPacketDirection
items.desc: Specifies whether packets flow into or out of the queue.

items.name: - CopyDataQueue
items.desc: Returns the dispatch queue that this object uses to execute tasks.

items.name: - SetDataQueue
items.desc: Assigns the specified dispatch source to this object.
